meta.name: LinkedIn Job Search: Auto-Match Resume with AI + Cover Letter & Telegram Alerts

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

parameters.content: Worklofw executes daily at 5pm, you can change the interval and time of execution.
Read user resume from google drive, you need to upload your resume in pdf format and select in **From List** section.
Convert pdf file into text to AI can read content.

Read search filter consiste of keywords, location, experience level, remot, job type and easy apply from google sheet.

You can download [this Template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mtKVxj_z_QCLGXMx0mJVihWSgS41SzHfU1Rv4r_mRY0) and copy in your personal space.
Create Linkedin search url from filter params.
Extrat Job links from Linkdin search result
Wait 10 sec between each job fetch.
Parse job HTML page, extract **title**, **company**, **location**, **jobDescription** and **applyLink** from it

AI model compare your resume and job description and rate your resume from 0-100, (0 does not match, 100 fully match) and also AI will write a sample cover letter based on your resume and your expriences and job description.
I used Gemini model here, you can use othe AI model like OpenAI (chat GPT)

Add new job with score in google sheet.

You can download [this Template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mtKVxj_z_QCLGXMx0mJVihWSgS41SzHfU1Rv4r_mRY0) and copy in your personal space.
Send telegram message if matching score is greater than criteria defined in previuos step.
Filter job that has score higher than 50. you can change filter criteria in this node.

      Den Jobinserenten von Cavendish Professionals direkt kontaktieren

      Francesca Pollard

      Francesca Pollard

      Technologyüë©üíª | Software Engineeringüíª| DevOps & Cloud ‚òÅÔ∏è| DEIB Community Founder & Advisor ü§ù | DACH üåç

      üöÄ We're Hiring: Staff Engineer (ML-Native / Software Engineering) ‚Äì Remote or Berlin-Based


      Hi everyone! üëã I‚Äôm currently hiring for a Staff Engineer to join a global tech company that‚Äôs shaping the future of online safety and digital experiences.


      This role is ideal for someone who lives at the intersection of machine learning and strong software engineering, and wants to build real-world systems that make a difference.


      üß† What You'll Be Doing:


      • Designing & building scalable systems‚Äîfrom ML pipelines to microservices and APIs
      • Owning full lifecycle delivery: from research notebooks or rough concepts to clean, robust, and reliable production code
      • Collaborating across teams‚Äîengineering, product, data, and more
      • Leading by example as a senior individual contributor, mentoring others and setting technical direction
      • Working with cloud infrastructure (GCP preferred), security-first architecture, and modern dev practices


      üåü What They‚Äôre Looking For:


      • A builder‚Äôs mindset: you thrive on solving problems end-to-end, not just prototyping
      • Deep backend/software engineering experience (we use modern cloud platforms, containers, APIs, etc.)
      • ML-native thinking: you're excited by ML, know when (and when not) to apply it, and can scale it pragmatically
      • Strong systems design, architecture, and a clear, pragmatic communication style
      • Experience leading complex technical projects or products, either in a company, startup, or open-source community


      Bonus points if you‚Äôve worked on privacy tech, GraphQL, OAuth, embedded systems, or large-scale data pipelines.


      üåç Why You Might Love It:


      ‚úÖ A bold mission with global impact

      ‚úÖ Remote-first setup (EST to CET) + offices in Berlin & multiple other locations

      ‚úÖ Smart, passionate teammates and huge autonomy

      ‚úÖ Competitive salary, benefits, and strong support for professional growth

      ‚úÖ The chance to ‚Äúre-found‚Äù a company at a pivotal moment in its evolution


      If this sounds like something you'd thrive in‚Äîor even if you're just curious‚ÄîI'd love to chat and tell you more.


      Feel free to apply here or drop me a message directly.


      #Hiring #StaffEngineer #SoftwareEngineering #MLJobs #RemoteWork #Cybersecurity #TechForGood #BackendEngineering #BerlinJobs
